__e: No, after you left, I phoned a friend, like I said.
I rang her mum and she said she had no idea, but then Harry phoned a bit later and said she was there.
She's probably round her boyfriend's. So she hasn't phoned mummy and daddy.
[Nikki] A couple of nights ago, he said he was meeting with a client. Then I phoned him at the office and he wasn't there.
So why was his next call to your business partner?
You were out of town, and I called the newspaper for you.
A person phoned, but we can not know who he is.
I'd have rung, but... ..I didn't know how things were between you.
When she didn't come in this morning or call, I phoned, but got no answer.
Oh, the last time I rang you to make an appointment, I got that other girl, erm...
Who, unlike some people, called me on my birthday.
I've just had another person telephone to tell me Sergeant Taylor questioned them about you.
I rang her the next day, no answer and I haven't heard from her since.
I haven't, uh, I-I haven't called, and I meant to call so many times, but you're here now, right--right now.
The thing is, ive spoken to him over the phone, and hes expecting us at home.
What for? I don't know. Strange.
And when I telephoned him the next day, they told me he was dead!
The assistant got the phone, and he asked for you, not me.
